bill.title: Municipal Interlocal Agreements; revise requirements when providing police protection for public schools.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 17-13-11, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Any Interlocal Agreement Made By A Local Governmental Unit To Provide Police Protection To A Public School As Described Shall Not Be Required To Be Submitted To The Attorney General; To Amend Section 17-13-9, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That Municipalities May Enter Into An Agreement With A County Under This Chapter To Provide Police Protection To Any Public School Located Within Either The Municipal Or County Jurisdiction; To Provide That All Such Agreements Shall Be Passed By The Governing Authorities Of The Municipality And The Board Of Supervisors Of The County; To Provide That Within Thirty Days Of The Effective Days Of This Act, Such Agreements Shall Be Presented To The Attorney General, The Secretary Of State And The State Auditor; And For Related Purposes.
